from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType, ArrayType, StructType, StructField
from pyspark.sql import Row
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

results = spark.sql(f"""
                SELECT DISTINCT 
                    MD5(
                        CONCAT(
                            COALESCE(CAST(documentId AS INTEGER), ''), 
                            COALESCE(filename, ''), 
                            COALESCE(CAST(version AS INTEGER), '')
                        )
                    ) AS {primary_key}
                    ,CAST(NULL AS LONG) AS AIEDocumentDataID
                    ,documentId
                    ,caseRef
                    ,documentReference
                    ,version
                    ,examinationRefNo
                    ,filename
                    ,originalFilename
                    ,size
                    ,mime
                    ,documentUri
                    ,path
                    ,virusCheckStatus
                    ,fileMD5
                    ,dateCreated
                    ,lastModified
                    ,caseType
                    ,documentStatus
                    ,redactedStatus
                    ,publishedStatus
                    ,datePublished
                    ,documentType
                    ,securityClassification
                    ,sourceSystem
                    ,origin
                    ,owner
                    ,author
                    ,representative
                    ,description
                    ,stage
                    ,filter1
                    ,filter2

                    ,"0" as Migrated
                    ,"Horizon" as ODTSourceSystem
                    ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
                    ,to_timestamp(expected_from)  AS IngestionDate
                    ,CAST(null as string) as ValidTo -- to avoid any null descrepancies
                    ,'' as RowID
                    ,'Y' as IsActive
                FROM
                    {horizon_table} AS Doc
                WHERE
                    expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM {horizon_table})
Now need to sort internal ids, IsActive flags, and valid_to dates

spark.sql(f"""
    CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_aie_document_data_calculations_base
        AS
        SELECT  
            row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY {primary_key} ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC) AS ReverseOrderProcessed
            ,row_number() OVER(ORDER BY IngestionDate asc, {primary_key} asc) AS AIEDocumentDataID
            ,{primary_key}
            ,IngestionDate
            ,ValidTo
            ,'0' AS Migrated
            ,CASE row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY {primary_key} ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC)
                WHEN 1 THEN
                    'Y'
                ELSE
                    'N'
            END AS IsActive                
        FROM
            {spark_table_final}

df_calcs = spark.sql(f"""
                        SELECT
                            CurrentRow.AIEDocumentDataID
                            ,CurrentRow.{primary_key} 
                            ,CurrentRow.IngestionDate
                            ,COALESCE(NULLIF(CurrentRow.ValidTo,''), NextRow.IngestionDate) AS ValidTo
                            ,"0" AS Migrated
                            ,CurrentRow.IsActive
                        FROM
                            vw_aie_document_data_calculations_base AS CurrentRow
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_aie_document_data_calculations_base AS NextRow
                                ON CurrentRow.{primary_key} = NextRow.{primary_key}
                                AND CurrentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed - 1 = NextRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                            ORDER BY currentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                    """)

results = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT DISTINCT 
                        {primary_key}
                        ,AIEDocumentDataID
                        ,documentId
                        ,caseRef
                        ,documentReference
                        ,version
                        ,examinationRefNo
                        ,filename
                        ,originalFilename
                        ,size
                        ,mime
                        ,documentUri
                        ,path
                        ,virusCheckStatus
                        ,fileMD5
                        ,dateCreated
                        ,lastModified
                        ,caseType
                        ,documentStatus
                        ,redactedStatus
                        ,publishedStatus
                        ,datePublished
                        ,documentType
                        ,securityClassification
                        ,sourceSystem
                        ,origin
                        ,owner
                        ,author
                        ,representative
                        ,description
                        ,stage
                        ,filter1
                        ,filter2

                        ,Migrated
                        ,ODTSourceSystem
                        ,IngestionDate
                        ,ValidTo
                        ,MD5(CONCAT(
                                IFNULL(AIEDocumentDataID, '.')
                                ,IFNULL(documentId,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(caseRef,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(documentReference,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(version,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(examinationRefno,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(filename,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(originalFilename,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(size,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(mime,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(documentUri,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(path,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(virusCheckStatus,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(fileMD5,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(dateCreated,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(lastModified,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(caseType,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(documentStatus,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(redactedStatus,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(publishedStatus,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(datePublished,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(documentType,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(securityClassification,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(sourceSystem,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(origin,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(owner,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(author,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(representative,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(description,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(stage	,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(filter1,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(filter2,'.')
                                ,IFNULL(publishedStatus, '.')
                                ,IFNULL(Migrated, '.')
                                ,IFNULL(ODTSourceSystem, '.')
                                ,IFNULL(IngestionDate, '.')
                                ,IFNULL(ValidTo, '.')
                            )
                        ) AS RowID
                        ,IsActive
                    FROM 
                        {spark_table_final}
                """)

logInfo(f"Merging and de-duplicating from {spark_table_final}")
final_df = results.join(df_calcs, (df_calcs[f"temp_{primary_key}"] == results[primary_key]) & (df_calcs["temp_IngestionDate"] == results["IngestionDate"])).select(columns)
final_df = final_df.drop(primary_key).drop_duplicates()
logInfo(f"Done merging and de-duplicating from {spark_table_final}")
